data.lyric:
[ti:Cozy Little Christmas]
[ar:Four Of Diamonds]
[al:Cozy Little Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Cozy Little Christmas - Four Of Diamonds
[00:01.62]Lyrics by：Katheryn Hudson/Ferras Alqaisi/Greg Wells
[00:03.24]Composed by：Katheryn Hudson/Ferras Alqaisi/Greg Wells
[00:04.87]Everybody's in a hurry in a flurry
[00:10.04]Shopping 'til they're droppin' in the snow
[00:13.26]Kids are cryin' dogs are barkin'
[00:17.05]Catching up with folks we barely know
[00:20.38]Sure it's madness but it's magic
[00:23.78]As soon as you hang up the mistletoe
[00:27.06]'Cause you're the reason for the season
[00:30.72]No we don't need to keep up with the Jones
[00:33.69]Our love is something priceless
[00:40.70]I don't need diamonds no sparkly things no oh no
[00:47.57]'Cause you can't buy this a-feeling no no no
[00:54.61]Nothing lights my fire or wraps me up baby like you do
[01:00.12]Just want a cozy a cozy little Christmas here with you
[01:07.19]So Mr. Santa
[01:09.12]Take the day off
[01:10.87]Get a massage
[01:12.65]'Cause we've got this one all under control
[01:15.92]A little whiskey
[01:17.69]We're getting frisky
[01:19.61]And slow dancing to Nat King Cole
[01:22.79]No we ain't stressin'
[01:24.76]Just caressin'
[01:26.65]Warming up our popsicle toes
[01:30.03]Nothing's missin'
[01:31.62]'Cause you're a blessin'
[01:33.38]Yes you're the only one I'm looking for
[01:36.41]Our love is something priceless
[01:43.45]I don't need diamonds no sparkly things
[01:48.14]No no no
[01:50.16]'Cause you can't buy this a-feeling
[01:54.73]No no no
[01:57.26]Nothing lights my fire or wraps me up baby like you do
[02:02.90]Just want a cozy a cozy little Christmas here with you
[02:12.14]A cozy little Christmas here with you
[02:19.24]No no no no
[02:21.93]I don't need diamonds no sparkly things
[02:26.62]No no no
[02:28.64]'Cause you can't buy this a-feeling
[02:33.16]No no no
[02:35.75]Nothing lights my fire or wraps me up baby like you do
[02:41.45]Just want a cozy a cozy little Christmas here with you
[02:51.85]Just you and me under a tree
[02:57.35]A cozy little Christmas here with you
data.trans:
[ti:Cozy Little Christmas]
[ar:Four Of Diamonds]
[al:Cozy Little Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:01.62]//
[00:03.24]//
[00:04.87]每个人都匆匆忙忙不知所措
[00:10.04]疯狂购物直到他们被雪吞没
[00:13.26]小孩在哭狗在叫
[00:17.05]和我们几乎不认识的人叙旧
[00:20.38]当然这是疯狂但这是魔法
[00:23.78]当你挂上槲寄生花环
[00:27.06]因为这个季节都是因为你
[00:30.72]我们不需要亦步亦趋
[00:33.69]我们的爱价值连城
[00:40.70]我不需要钻石不需要闪闪发光的东西
[00:47.57]因为你买不起这种感觉
[00:54.61]没有什么能像你一样点燃我的热情将我包围宝贝
[01:00.12]只想和你度过一个惬意的圣诞节
[01:07.19]所以圣诞老人先生
[01:09.12]请一天假
[01:10.87]做个按摩
[01:12.65]因为这一切都在我们的掌控之中
[01:15.92]一点威士忌
[01:17.69]我们欢呼雀跃
[01:19.61]随着NatKingCole的歌声慢慢起舞
[01:22.79]我们没有压力
[01:24.76]关心一下
[01:26.65]让我们的脚趾暖起来
[01:30.03]什么都不缺
[01:31.62]因为你是上天的恩赐
[01:33.38]没错你就是我在寻找的唯一一个人
[01:36.41]我们的爱价值连城
[01:43.45]我不需要钻石不需要闪闪发光的东西
[01:48.14]不不不
[01:50.16]因为这种感觉你买不到
[01:54.73]不不不
[01:57.26]没有什么能像你一样点燃我的热情将我包围宝贝
[02:02.90]只想和你度过一个惬意的圣诞节
[02:12.14]与你共度一个惬意的小圣诞
[02:19.24]不
[02:21.93]我不需要钻石不需要闪闪发光的东西
[02:26.62]不不不
[02:28.64]因为这种感觉你买不到
[02:33.16]不不不
[02:35.75]没有什么能像你一样点燃我的热情将我包围宝贝
[02:41.45]只想和你度过一个惬意的圣诞节
[02:51.85]树下只有你和我
[02:57.35]与你共度一个惬意的小圣诞
